```{r}
deviation_height = 50
nsamples = 22
wind_speed_distribution = rnorm(mean = 250,
              sd = 30,
              n = nsamples)
veg_height = runif(min = h - deviation_height,
              max = h + deviation_height,
              n = nsamples)



parameters = cbind.data.frame(wind_speed_distribution, veg_height)
Cat_sensitivity = parameters %>%
  pmap(~atm_conduct(vm = wind_speed_distribution, h=veg_height))

```
